text: The Schooldays of Jesus is a 2016 novel by J. M. Coetzee. It is Coetzee's 13th novel and is a sequel to the 2013 novel The Childhood of Jesus. It resumes the story of a young boy named David who is brought up in a foreign land. In July 2016, it was longlisted for the 2016 Man Booker Prize. ==Awards and honors== *2016 Man Booker Prize, longlistee. ==References== Category:2016 novels Category:South African novels Category:Novelistic portrayals of Jesus Category:Sequel novels
title: The Schooldays of Jesus
